description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Simon Brown - Independent consultant

ABSTRACT
"We value working software over comprehensive documentation" is what the manifesto for agile software development says, with the typical misinterpretation of these few words being "don't write documentation". Of course, that's not what the manifesto says and "no documentation" certainly wasn't the intent. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7769

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: GOTO 2016 • Visualise, Document and Explore Your Software Architechture • Simon Brown
